DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate RevLite Q-Switched Neodymium : Yttrium-Aluminum-Garnet ( Nd : YAG ) Laser treatment acne scar darker skin type ( Fitzpatrick Skin Types III , IV , V VI ) .
DOC.brief_title: Laser Treatment Acne Scars Fitzpatrick Skin Types III-VI
DOC.criteria: 18 year old Fitzpatrick Skin Type III , IV , V VI Evidence atrophic scar Pregnancy , lactate plan become pregnant study History cutaneous photosensitization , porphyria , hypersensitivity porphyrin photodermatosis Any skin pathology condition could interfere evaluation require use interfere topical systemic therapy Any condition , investigator 's opinion , would make unsafe subject participate Currently enrol investigational drug device trial , receive investigational drug treat investigational device within 30 day prior enter study Subject unable communicate cooperate investigator due language problem , poor mental development , impaired cerebral function Subject may unreliable study . This include subject engage excessive alcohol intake drug abuse , subject unable return schedule followup visit Use oral topical isotretinoin therapy within 6 month prior enrollment . With exception isotretinoin , subject allow continue topical oral acne medication trial Need expose artificial tanning device excessive sunlight trial Prior treatment parenteral gold therapy Diabetes Type I II , Lupus , Scleroderma similar immune system disorder Subject agree refrain type facial skin resurfacing ( e.g. , microdermabrasion , laser IPL treatment , chemical peel ) inject filler/other substance ( e.g. , Restylane , Botox ) might affect treatment area duration study Underlying silicone nonabsorbable filler treatment area filler ( e.g. , collagen , fat ) injection within past 3 month History keloidal scar nodulocystic acne Phenol chemical peel dermabrasion treatment area within past 6 month
